name: Redbud Falls
description:
Ruby has come to Redbud Falls to spend some time at her late grandmother's farmhouse, but she gets stuck at the local farmers market. While it's nice to reconnect with her old friend Rusty, he's suspicious of his neighbors over the theft of some tomato plants.

Can Ruby unravel the mystery, or will she leave the market without helping her friend? Have fun and try not to get sunburned!

Made with Ink for NDJam4.
